description: Walsall are knocked off the top of League Two as Port Vale leapfrog them with victory at the Bescot Stadium.
title: Walsall 2-3 Port Vale
maintext:
Walsall have won each of their last five league games against Port Vale, keeping clean sheets in each of their last three meetings with Vale.
Port Vale have won just three of their last 33 away league games against Walsall since 1949 (D9 L21), last winning away against the Saddlers in April 2017.
League leaders Walsall are winless in their last eight league games (D6 L2), the current longest run without victory of any League Two side.
